6531.quoteText:
You may have the right to access or receive certain information about the personal data we process about you.
You also may have a right to have your personal data rectified, to object to the processing of your personal data, or to ask us to restrict processing or delete your personal data
6531.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

6533.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

6579.quoteText: Our website uses fonts by Google LLC (“Google”) (“Google Fonts”).
6579.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

6580.quoteText: We use the services of SendGrid to send transactional emails, including account creation emails, password resets, purchase receipts, and account notifications
6580.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

6581.quoteText: Customer data is never sold, and is not shared with third parties for those third parties’ own business interests
6581.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: Your personal data is not sold

6582.quoteText: We also use the services of Autopilot, an email automation platform, to better reach ShapeShift product subscribers who have opted in to receive such communications.
6582.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

6586.quoteText: You can prevent Google Analytics from using your data by downloading and installing a browser add-on to disable Google Analytics (https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout?hl=en).
6586.title: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions

tosdr.case: Third party cookies are employed, but with opt out instructions

6587.quoteText:
We use the services of Cloudflare, Inc.
(“Cloudflare”) in order to identify trusted web traffic (i.e.
to identify individual clients behind a shared IP address and apply security settings on a per-client basis), in which we have a legitimate interest
6587.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

6592.quoteText: Segment uses cookies and other similar tracking technologies in order to provide these services.
6592.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

6593.quoteText: The ShareThis Plugin uses cookies and informs ShareThis that you visited the website.
6593.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

tosdr.case: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

6594.quoteText: The information collected by ShareThis may include user data (including IP address) and the geographical region as well as technical data.
6594.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

tosdr.case: This service may collect, use, and share location data

6596.quoteText: Referral Hero and its service providers automatically collect certain information using tracking technologies like cookies, web beacons and similar technologies, and web forms.
6596.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

6597.quoteText: We also use cookies to analyze the use of the website, to optimize our services and to enable the use of marketing tools.
6597.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

6601.quoteText:
We also use Google Tag Manager to set re-targeting tags.
These tags enable us to target users with information about our services when they visit different websites.
6601.title: This service tracks you on other websites

tosdr.case: This service tracks you on other websites

6605.quoteText: The data sharing may include transfers to companies or organizations in countries without an adequate standard of data protection.
6605.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

6606.quoteText: Specifically, we may need to further process and retain your personal data to perform a contract with you or your company or organization, to protect our legitimate interests (such as the establishment, exercise or defense of legal claims) or to comply with legal requirements.
6606.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations

tosdr.case: Some personal data may be kept after the end of the data retention period or a request for erasure
